page.title: 01LANDSCAPE ST NEOT VILLAGE
page.content: St Neot is a village on the eastern edge of Bodmin moor.The population is 683 not including children.There are a lot of amusements in the village like snooker, billiards, pool, darts, euchre(card game), skittles, badminton, short tennis and a playing field. Most of the houses are privately owned but some of them are council houses.Most people work in the china clay pits.Three new houses have been built in the past two years.The places most visitors find interesting are the church,the caverns and the dam.There is one village project at the moment which is the youth club.There are two times when the villagers come together that is St Neot week and oak apple fayre.Mrs Kent is the oldest person in the village she is 90-91.Most houses are made of slate.
